branchCategory.name: ACG20A~40A, Filter Regulator w/Built-in Pressure Gauge, Lubricator
branchCategory.description: <p>The modular style ACG series allows you to pick a combination of air preparation equipment that best suit your particular application.  The selectable angle of the pressure gauge improves its' visibility, and the anti-revolving mechanism (PAT.PEND.) will not allow the pressure gauge to be revolved even after the handle is operated.  Assembly and maintenance are easily performed resulting in reduced downtime and labor savings.</p>
